furniture.name: Armchair Jimi
furniture.general_description: An armchair like the big one for the kids... sober and simple design. Ideal in the children's room from 6-8 years!
feature: For children from 6-8 years
Structure in steel and plywood
Polyurethane foam padding 25 kg/m3 (back and armrests) and 33 kg/m3 (seat)
Upholstered in 100% polyester fabric
Legs in solid beech wood with oak tint, finished with nitrocellulose varnish

furniture.name: Armchair Jimi
furniture.general_description: Armchair with a neo-retro and modern style, legs in ash wood ! Remarkable comfort and style.
feature: Legs in solid ash wood with nitrocellulose varnish
Upholstery 80% polyester, 20% linen with contrasting decorative seams on the width for the celadon, mustard yellow and grey
Upholstery 100% polyester contrasting decorative seams on the width for the almond green
Solid pine and plywood structure
Suspension by crossed elastic straps
Legs in solid ash wood with nitrocellulose varnish, height 27 cm

furniture.name: Table lamp Copita
furniture.general_description: A simple and modern design for the contemporary touch of your interior with the table lamp Copita.
feature: Socket E14 for energy saving lamp 8W Max, (not included)
Compatible with lamps with energy value class : ABCDE
Lamp in metal covered with epoxy paint

furniture.name: Wall lamp Sunny
furniture.general_description: A successful combination of metal and rattan for the Sunny wall lamp, a Scandinavian retro spirit that will cause a sensation in a room or a hallway
feature: Structure in metal covered with white epoxy paint and decor in bleached rattan
Socket E27 for energy saving bulb of max. 15W, (not included)
Compatible with bulbs of energy class: A

furniture.name: Spherical armchair Jimi
furniture.general_description: A very nice armchair: Beautiful ergonomic shape, ideal for the living -oom or bedroom, takes up little space.
feature: Upholstery in bouclette fabric 100% polyester, sheep aspect
Seat structure in plywood and steel covered with bouclette fabric
Legs in solid beech wood finished with nitrocellulose varnish
Padding in polyether foam, seat density 25 kg/m³, armrests and backrest density 18 kg/m³

furniture.name: Armchair Avant
furniture.general_description: Design inspired by the 60s with fine and sleek legs, very comfortable and sober.
feature: Upholstery : 100% polyester
Structure : solid fir wood and chipboard
Suspension by elastic and crossed straps
Legs (to assemble yourself): solid beech, nitrocellulose varnish, height 31 cm

furniture.name: Side table Rosali
furniture.general_description: Side table Rosali with vintage spirit due to the leg part in reverse V in steel wire combined with two table tops, one in steel wire and one covered with reed stems.
feature: 2 table tops in black painted steel wire with epoxy finish (the lower plateau is covered with natural reed stems and finished with colorless nitrocellulose varnish)
Leg section in painted steel wire finished with black epoxy
Plastic floor caps

furniture.name: Swivel desk chair, Quilda
furniture.general_description: Revolving office chair Quilda. Beautiful combination of fabric and natural wood upholstery, this Quilda office chair with vintage design is also very sturdy and comfortable.
feature: Revolving seat, not adjustable in height, covered with fabric 100% polyester
Padding in polyurethane foam 30 kg/m³
Leg part in solid beech, oak shade, finished with nitrocellulose varnish

furniture.name: Garden table armchair, Irati
furniture.general_description: The garden armchair Irati is signed AMPM. The olefin cushions offer 2 advantages : durability and outdoor comfort, for this armchair with an elegant silhouette. A hand-woven backrest rests on a tubular base.
feature: Upholstery of the cushion: olefin (100% polypropylene), designed for outdoor use

Structure : aluminum shell and galvanized steel leg section. The aluminum is more suitable for outdoor use than the traditional metal, it is light and strong, and it is naturally anti-corrosive without the need for chemical treatments
Handwoven in synthetic rope (polyester)

furniture.name: Armchair Dilma
furniture.general_description: Armchair Dilma is characterized by the simplicity of its structure in solid FSC® oak. The organic lines, sculpted armrests and polished corners evoke the softness of Scandinavian armchairs from the 1950s. The right angle of the backrest and the comfortable viscose cushions make this a timeless armchair. Dilma, an iconic armchair from AMPM.
feature: Upholstery in 100% linen
Solid oak® frame with nitrocellulose finish
Seat in plywood with layer of oak

furniture.name: Bedside table with 1 drawer Janik
furniture.general_description: Scandinavian style, very practical thanks to the drawer.
feature: Chest in lacquered MDF finished with NC
Bicolor legs in solid pine wood finished with NC

furniture.name: Bedside table, HIBA
furniture.general_description: Nightstand Hiba. Industrial spirit, the Hiba bedside table is both practical and trendy. Can be combined with other furniture from the Hiba range.
feature: Brossed solid pine wood, finished with nitrocellulose varnish
Leg part in lacquered steel black epoxy

furniture.name: Bedside table, Lodge
furniture.general_description: The 2-drawer Lodge bedside table offers a vision of elegance with a vintage spirit inspired by the 50s, which is very fashionable in its decoration. The striped drawer fronts and metal legs here evoke the inventive and creative talent of the designers of the time.
feature: In oak and MDF with oak veneer and finished with nitrocellulose varnish
Striped drawer fronts
2 slanted drawers at the top for easy opening
Leg part in metal with epoxy finish
Supplied pre-assembled

furniture.name: Night table Jimi
furniture.general_description: Bedside table Jimi, 1 drawer. Scandinavian inspiration for an original and unique touch, very nice for everyday use.
feature: 1 storage drawer
Lacquered MDF
Solid pine wood legs
Nitrocellulose finish

furniture.name: Wall bedside table, Jimi
furniture.general_description: Wood/metal contrast with a clean design for a contemporary style.
feature: Structure in lacquered metal, finished with epoxy
Drawer in MDF with oak layer and finished with NC
varnish, melamine bottom

furniture.name: Bedside table Volga
furniture.general_description: Bedside table Volga with straight and clean lines. Nice combination of wood and steel. A must in every room.
feature: 1 drawer
Box in MDF with oak veneer finished with NC varnish
Leg section and handle in metal and epoxy

furniture.name: Bedside table, Buisseau
furniture.general_description: Bedside table Buisseau. Its retro-trendy spirit and organic curves will seduce you. Crafted in oak and rattan stems, the bedside table with double tabletop provides a chic natural touch in the room!
feature: Solid oak leg with a nitrocellulose varnish finish
Top table top in MDF with a layer of oak and a nitrocellulose finish
Lower table top in rattan stems and solid oak

furniture.name: Bench in bouclette, Bola
furniture.general_description: Made from a warm and comfortable bouclette fabric, with a practical drawer for your personal belongings, Bola is the entrance sofa. An exclusive design La Redoute Intérieurs.
feature: Structure in solid fir wood and chipboard
Legs in solid beech
Plywood drawer with oak veneer
Knob handle in black metal with epoxy finish
Seat and legs upholstered in 100% polyester terry

furniture.name: Set of 2 bar stools, Nordie
furniture.general_description: Between kitchen and dining room, the 2 Nordie high chairs offer perfect design and comfort around the table or island, H105 cm.
feature: Leg section and footrest in tubular steel, decor in oak
Seat in veneer wood filled with polyurethane foam
Upholstery in 100% mélange gray polyester

furniture.name: Table 4 - 6 people, Adza
feature: Inverted 'V' legs in steel
Made in Europe
Table top in solid oak, FSC (FSC-N003174) certificate, bevelled, finished with clear acrylic varnish
Legs in black lacquered steel with epoxy finish
Felt round non-slip floor caps)
furniture.general_description: An industrial spirit, table Adza with a new trend, a mix of oak and black metal.

furniture.name: Round table 4-6 people, Larsen
furniture.general_description: The charm of vintage, the elegance of walnut and refined finishes. The Larsen table combines design and functionality and defines the decor. A design La Redoute Intérieurs.
feature: Leg part in solid walnut and beveled table top in MDF veneered in walnut (solid bevelled edge), finish with nitrocellulose varnish
Plastic caps and adjustable

furniture.name: Larsen chair
furniture.general_description: the elegance of walnut and refined finishes. The Larsen chairs combine design and character, extremely deco. The leather seats offer an extremely high level of comfort. A design La Redoute Intérieurs.
feature: Legs and backrest in solid walnut, finished with nitrocellulose varnish
Seat in plywood, filled with polyurethane foam (30kg/m3) Upholstered in corrected grain cowhide, Aniline finish (chrome tanned)
Sold per set of 2
